Ida Månsson

Mozilla Contributor | Firefox Developer | Browser Privacy Advocate

Karlskrona, Sweden

Development

Talk at StockholmFoss 2026

Contributing to Firefox: A Swedish Perspective

15:00 Sal B

About

Ida Månsson is a Mozilla contributor working on Firefox from Karlskrona, Sweden. She started contributing as a hobby and has landed 200+ patches, focusing on privacy features and UI improvements. She's passionate about browser diversity and making the Firefox contribution experience accessible to newcomers.

StockholmFoss 2026

Saturday, May 23rd, 2026
KTH Royal Institute of Technology
Brinellvägen 8, 114 28 Stockholm

"Öppen källkod för alla"

Open source for everyone

StockholmFoss is a non-profit event organized by volunteers. All speakers donate their time.

No surveillance, no corporate capture, just FOSS.
